thread.title: Local fashion publication lists STL's 'Top 50 Women'
thread.title_full: Local fashion publication lists STL's 'Top 50 Women'

author: Joe Holleman St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: Local fashion publication lists STL's 'Top 50 Women'
text:
( … ) 
Anne Allred 
To help celebrate March as "Women's History Month," fashion publication Gazelle STL has named its "Top 50 Women in St. Louis." 
The list singles out local women who have contributed in a variety of fields, including business, communications, politics and philanthropy. 
Some of the higher-profile names include: Build-A-Bear’s Maxine Clark ; Sweetie Pie's boss Robbie Montgomery ; politicians Claire McCaskill and Ann Wagner ; St. Louis symphony topper Marie-Helene Bernard ; jazz vocalist Denise Thimes ; radio's Carol Daniels (KMOX) and Jen Myers (KYKY) and television's Anne Allred of KSDK (Channel 5) and Emily Rau , who is leaving KMOV (Channel 4) this week. 
For a complete list of the 50 honored women, go to gazellestl.com . 
Anne Allred
